rukus.text: Do Midyan my sent ich brat Shu aib. He said O moj ludia kult GOD ona nie have inak god Him. Proof pojdem ona tvoj Lord Ona dat full weight full measure when ona zivnost. Nie cheat ludia ich na pravo! Nie zhnity zem it set straight This je lepsie ona if ona bol believers
Zdrzat Sa blocking kazdy chodnicek seeking zapudit those verit chodnicek GOD nie robit it crooked Zapamatat Si ona pouzivat bol few He multiplied tvoj zvazok! Recall consequences for the zlomyselny
Ihned some z ona have verit v co ja sent some disbelieved cakat GOD issues Jeho judgment us; He bol dobry judge
arrogant leaders jeho ludia said My evict ona O Shu aib dohromady those kto verit ona our town ona revert our nabozenstvo. He said ona force us

My blaspheming GOD my reverted tvoj nabozenstvo GOD saved us z it Ako my revert zadny do it will GOD our Lord Our Lord's znalost encompasses all things. My put our trust GOD Our Lord grant us decisive victory our ludia! Ona je dobre supporter
disbelieving leaders jeho ludia said ona nasledovat Shu aib ona bol losers
quake annihilated them lavy them dead ich domov
Those zamietnut Shu aib zmiznut, mat rad they never existed Those zamietnut Shu aib bol losers
He turned them saying O moj ludia ja delivered ona odkaz moj Lord ja radit ona! Ako mozem ja rmutit sa disbelieving ludia
